title: Breaks taken during psych experiments lower participants’ moods
description: The lowered mood could throw off the results of studies with rest breaks.

description: Investor lawsuit cites recall of Tesla cars that act dangerously in intersections.

description: Just like a 2018 Apple Watch, the Pixel Watch can call 911 after a hard fall.

title: Chipmakers receiving US federal funds can’t expand in China for 10 years

title: LastPass says employee’s home computer was hacked and corporate vault taken
